title: Just looking for a place to revise.
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


With libraries and coffee shops close its just so much harder to revise at home.

I was looking for a place where I can leave my books and revise during the day then just go home. 

This would suit anyone who would just like company as we could talk like friends or go for walks when I have free time.

It would be nice if you had a desk that you didnt use and during the day I would bring my own food.

I was looking for somewhere close as travel is quite expensive. It would only be till the summertime hopefully.

I am a woman, African decent, I find it easy to talk to anyone, I am quite social and I soon hope to go to university in September.
